Posts.Content: hope it went well. i've had 5 of these. 2 in one breast once. it wasnt so bad, the worst part was lying still for a long time. i had bc in 2002, but the needle biopsies have been since the BC and were benign
Posts.Title: Stereotactic Breast Biopsy-needle

Posts.Content: i had a lump in my armpit. it was huge. i overlooked it for a year. When i finally went to find out what it was, i had stage3 BC. (plus 2 other lumps) dont put it off!
Posts.Title: What Were Your Symptoms?

Posts.Content: i was dx with Stage2 B Breast Cancer in 2002. i had large3 tumors, and the surgery ended up taking almost half my breast. my margins were clear, although it was almost borderline.i had A/C chemo, 33 rads, 4 of 14 nodes were positive. i took tamoxifen for 2 years, then switched health insurance and started with a new oncologist. He said, because of the aggressiveness of my cancer, he'd prefer that i take Femara. i took that for 1.5 yrs until money ran short, and i had to stop femara. Now that i'm financially back on track, i see the oncologist soon. What do you think the odds are that i will be done with the Femara? and of course, in the back of my mind, is my cancer going to come back, because i didnt really complete either the Femara or Tamoxifen?
Posts.Title: Tamoxifen AND Femara

Posts.Content: i know its tough, but it WILL ease up. it may seem like forever. i'm 7 yrs out, her2positive +++ Stage 3a (upgraded from Stage2b) etc. BUT, everyone around me was informed what it was like for me, and everyone assisted me. I kept fans close by.. handheld, and electric. we invested in a small a/c from Walmart for 90 bucks. i dressed in layers, because i was hot AND cold. my heat came from the outside in. when someone saw clothes flying off me, fans instantly came on, people would fan me. cooperation from everyone in the family was wonderful. I had a/c chemo, rads, was on Tamox and Femara. My menopause was chemo induced (i was 46). And really, i know it may seem difficult, but it will help you to have a sense of humor. oh, and water. keep water nearby!
Posts.Title: Her 2 Positive Breast Cancer ... Help !!

Posts.Content: Quote: Originally Posted by Stitcher317 How old were you went to went on it and how did you feel on both drugs? I understand the side effects are quite unpleasant. Also, both my parents died of strokes and I still have a uterus, thus the concerns regarding the Tamoxifen. I do understand the ramifications of getting Br. Cancer back again but concerned about the potential life threatening side effects. Thanks for your time. i didnt have one problem with either Tamoxifen or Femara.i was 46 when i started Tamoxifen. Of all of the drugs i have ever taken (diabetes, migraines etc) i have never had an adverse reaction to any of them.
Posts.Title: Tamoxifen AND Femara

Posts.Content: i finished chemo in 2003. my periods came back about a year after that, but only for a couple of days, and nothing since.
Posts.Title: Periods after Chemo

Posts.Content: Quote: Originally Posted by anxiety27 Hi all. My mom has Mets Breast and is currently on Doxil and Herception. Her current MUGA scan showed some weakness. The doctor wants to put her on different meds. For anyone out there who knows anything about this, could you please shine some light on a very worried daughter? i have doubts about the MUGA scan. before i started chemo, i had to get cleared and was sent for a MUGA. the results came back completely unfavorable. however, i was sent to a heart specialist, who did an ultrasound, and said that the results were fine. my chemo (a/c chemo and taxotere) were fine. its just about 6 yrs later, and alls well. can she get a second opinion?
Posts.Title: Metastatic breast cancer and MUGA results

Posts.Content: Quote: Originally Posted by Laura B I wonder about that 4 months window for radiation? I had two lumpectomies (they had to go back in 2 weeks after the first) The second lumpectomy was on 2/18/08. I have to have 8 chemotherapies, the first one was on 3/17/08. And I was told after I'm done with the chemo I have to have radiation treatments. That should be around August/September, that would be about a 5 to 6 month window? Laura i had my surgery in May 2002. started chemo at the end of july. 8 treatments. i started radiation in feb (so if i remember it was just a couple months after chemo). i had to wait a bit for my chemo, because i had failed sentinal node, so they took out 14 nodes and i was left with a pretty big scar there, and two big scars from my lumpectomy and biopy. maybe you could ask why you have to wait so long.
Posts.Title: when does radiation start after lumpectomy
